law.catch_line: Power to carry out plan by direct labor or contract.
law.text: The board of directors may devise, prepare for, execute, maintain and operate any or all works, or improvements necessary or desirable to complete, maintain, operate and protect the works provided for by the official plan. They may secure and use persons and equipment under the supervision of the chief engineer or other agents, or they may let contracts for such works, either as a whole or in part.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 386, sec. 48. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2062g-27.
